node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Beach
node.description: A small grove of trees grows alongside the lagoon, their broad sweeping branches reaching low and laden with the deep purple phofe flowers. These perfumed blossoms are so rare that they can only be found in this one location. The dampness that hovers over this island clings to the petals, filling the air with an intoxicating haze.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Beach
node.description: Freed from the protective circle of the lagoon, the surface of the sea is deceptively tranquil. A fallen palm tree lies in the surf, battered by the incessant lapping of the waves, while nearby, where the jungle creeps up to the beach, a small pile of oyster shells draws flies under a durian tree.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rocky Beach
node.description: Tropical brush and vines creep over the rocky divide between beach and jungle, seeking light and room to put down roots. As the beach curves towards some rocky cliffs to the north, the sea works at eroding the narrowing expanse, stealing a bit of sand with each gentle wave.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rocky Beach
node.description: As each wave washes up on the shore it slowly erodes the face of the beach, exposing more and more of the underlying rocky feet of the cliffs to the north. Black volcanic rocks and pink coral fragments clutter the sandy expanse between the jungle and the surf.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rocky Beach
node.description: Rock formations rising out of the sand make the path from the lagoon to the cliffs circuitous. Two large stones lean against each other in mute harmony, framing the sea in a natural arch. At the edge of the jungle, spiny fruits litter the ground under durian trees, swelling and cracking in the heat, sending a cloying rot to mix with the scent of the sea.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rocky Beach
node.description: Waves surge forcefully across the narrowing beach crashing against the foot of the volcanic rock cliffs rising overhead before being sucked back into the sea. The jungle edges forward in what little sand remains, exposed roots recoiling from the salty water while quickly tacking in place any soil blown by the wind. A felled durian tree, serving as a home for a few industrious sand crabs, lies across the path to a rocky point that extends into the churning surf.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rocky Point
node.description: The rocky point serves to break the force of the waves and halt complete erosion of the beach to the south. Angry water churns and thrashes against the craggy foundation of this stolid bastion, intermittently filling the air with salty spray. A semi-circular ring of cliffs to the north and volcanic rock formations rising from the bottom of the sea provide a turbulent residence for beds of oysters, as well as a challenging dive into the surf for those in search of pearls.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: A towering gate looms at a break in a sturdy bamboo wall, guarding entry into the village of Teil-Minavsel. The jungle lies not far away, closing in to the north and east and blocking off passage except to the west, where a thin trail tracks into the tangled embrace of the forest.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: An almost imperceptible trail winds between the tropical trees and thick underbrush. The bamboo gates of a village can be seen not far to the east, while a group of low, but steep mountains looms out of the jungle to the northeast.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: The route bends sharply here, curving around a copse of thick, thorny bushes. The air is alive with the screeching of rainbow-colored birds and the biting sting of tropical insects.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: The path to the west becomes more difficult to traverse as clinging vines drape from the tree limbs overhead, meshing with the undergrowth. Ruts in the loamy soil indicate someone has used a wagon to transport, or at least attempt to transport, items to and from the depths of the forest.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: The ground is steep and slippery, a rugged climb upward to the northwest. At the crescent of the slope lies the edge of a jungle. No sight or sound of civilization pierces the humid silence of the advancing forest.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Gaps in the foliage allow entry into the depths of the lush tropical forest to the west. The jungle is dark, shady and foreboding, the mingled scents of swamp water and sweet nectar breathing from deep within.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Not a clue exists to direct one's course. Danger lurks behind every bush for the weary traveler.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Thicket
node.description: A forbidding fortress of winding tendrils wraps about tree trunks and locks them in a continuous mesh, defying all but the sharpest machetes. Even now, the twisting vines have begun the work of reclosing the gap just created.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Foliage rustles and sways on every side, the constant movement obviously caused by more than merely the breeze. Ropy vines swag from tree to tree, their origin somewhere high in the canopy. Thick underbrush impedes movement, except to the west where a huge, deep pit plunges down into the ground.

node.name: Saendalen Sea, Near Shore
node.description: The water splashes playfully on the rocky beach, each ebb and flow grinding the stones against each other with a rasping sound. A glint of a fish flashes in the wake of the waves, but quickly darts out of sight. The small rocks shift underfoot as the water continues its constant advance and retreat upon the shore.

node.name: Saendalen Sea, Rocky Shelf
node.description: The depth of the water suddenly increases where the rock-littered shelf underfoot ends at a sharp demarcation, and the waves swell and dip before they break to the west. To the east, the deep water is rougher.

node.name: Saendalen Sea, Near Cliff
node.description: The water is deep and cold, the currents swift. A dangerous rock cliff cuts the inlet off from the rest of the open sea, but does little to shelter it from the rough seas.

node.name: Saendalen Sea, Deep Water
node.description: The farther from shore, the rougher the surf. Huge swells of saltwater sweep any flotsam great distances in a flash, all adrift in ceaseless motion. The size of the waves prevents further progress out to sea.

node.name: Saendalen Sea, Deep Water
node.description: The farther from shore, the rougher the surf. Huge swells of saltwater sweep any flotsam great distances in a flash, all adrift in ceaseless motion. The size of the waves prevents further progress out to sea.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Seord Telga
node.description: Cleared of most of the debris that litters the rest of the area, the forest floor is devoid of rubble. Mosses, herbs and fungi grow in random patches upon the ground. Large bromeliads and creepers spiral up the massive tree trunks, hugging the bark of the tightly on their way up into the canopy above.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Seord Telga
node.description: Immense trees of various shapes give way to a small clearing. Bits of paving stones are strewn about the ground, more thickly around the large obsidian pillar leaning dangerously towards collapse.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Seord Telga
node.description: Dense foliage crowds close around a narrow opening, concealing it under lush greens. The area is very difficult to navigate with rubble neatly hidden under the epiphytes and massive indigenous ferns obscuring the ground, causing a potential hazard to anyone passing through.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Seord Telga
node.description: The smell of damp earth hangs heavy upon the air in this ancient forest. Massive trees tower high above, seemingly standing guard over the flora and fauna that consider this rainforest home. The dense foliage of the immense trees that flourish in this wilderness creates a massive canopy high above.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Seord Telga
node.description: Brambles and lianas entwine about an enormous, collapsed tree. The surface of this once proud giant has become a home for an abundance of mosses and lichens that coat its surface. Sporadic hoots and calls echo from high above in the canopy.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gam Telga
node.description: The trees crowd closely here, blocking passage to the north and east. A narrow gap -- nearly obstructed by roots and bracken -- leads northeast, its destination lost in the dim and damp. The ferns here grow nearly as tall as a Gor'Tog, sheltering dark pools of standing water.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gam Telga
node.description: Numerous inexplicable sounds trickle through this area of the woods. A tangle of dreary trees marks the end of the dense forest, constructing a natural barrier barring any further passage southward.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gam Telga
node.description: The collapsing ruins of a massive stone wall mars the forest here, blocking passage to the west and south. Vines and creepers besiege the once-proud edifice, their roots and tendrils slowly bringing the structure to the ground. The trees beyond the wall are darker and denser than those here, their branches splayed high above like skeletal fingers.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gam Telga
node.description: The collapsed remains of a once glorious pillar lie in ruins, knocked over by some unknown force. Fruit-bearing plants have flourished here amongst the rubble, growing from within any crack or crevice upon the surface of the weatherworn stone.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gam Telga
node.description: Set into the forest floor is an enormous circular slab of stone. Four large pillars, each carved of different gemstone, have been placed in the cardinal directions. Towering high above, they seem to push the canopy asunder, allowing for a break in the dense foliage.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Atop the Cliff
node.description: Just back from the ledge, jungle brush and swampbay trees quickly become a solid wall beyond which distant mountains tower in the haze. To the east an open ring of cliffs rises over the churning water of the sea, while the way down the cliffs to the south descends to the beach. Birds swoop and glide through the air. Their cries echo off the rocky walls below and mingle with the sound of the crashing waves.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Atop the Cliff
node.description: The cliffs preside over the churning waters far below. Insistent jungle vegetation struggles to overgrow the narrow path, and a salty tang fills the air as the wind sweeps clear the scent of rotting durian fruit.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Atop the Cliff
node.description: Cool wind blows in off the sea only to be stifled by the impenetrable heat of the jungle. A ledge arches out over the water far below, forming a well-suited perch from which to attempt a perilous dive into the churning surf. Beneath the roiling waves large rock formations serve as a home to colonies of oysters.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Atop the Cliff
node.description: The thick growth of the jungle prevents further progress to the north. Off to the east, a column of rock has cracked and split away from the rest of the cliffs, forming a solitary natural tower looming over the churning water.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Atop the Cliff
node.description: Separated from the main cliff by a wide crack, this lonely pillar of rock faces the sea. Neither time nor distance has slowed the jungle from advancement, and seeds carried on the wind have taken root, filling almost every surface with vines and trees. Discarded, empty oysters shells litter the ground.

node.name: Saendalan Sea, Below the Cliffs
node.description: Jagged rock formations pierce the churning water, appearing and vanishing again beneath the swelling waves as they crash violently against the cliffs. Below the surface, the craggy stone sentinels spread into wide columns upon which beds of oysters have formed.

node.name: Saendalaen Sea, Oyster Bed
node.description: Pitted and jagged rocks are twisted and contorted into surreal shapes, creating a haven for creatures of the sea, including a hearty colony of oysters which cling to the craggy surfaces. Overhead, the depth of the water creates a deep blue ceiling that contrasts with the shell-speckled sand floor.

node.name: Saendalan Sea, Beneath the Waves
node.description: Brownish-green sea kelp writhes towards the surface as it dances in the turbulent water among rock formations that rise from the bottom. A current so strong it carries everything upward prevents exploring the oyster ledges below without a deeper dive.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: A family of monkeys has claimed this territory for their own. Chitters and chatters and screeches fill the air as they go about their business high in the branches. The monkeys are not always visible, but the swaying of the branches and vines, to say nothing of the constant din, attest to their very active presence.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: One of the younger trees, its trunk not quite shoulder width, succumbed to some disease and fell over a number of years ago. Saplings have sprung up all around the large hollow log, bushes have nestled up against it, and vines have overgrown it. The small clearing created by its demise will probably be completely gone within another generation.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Dozens of tall trees stand sentinel at the edge of an immense pit, although whether they are set to mark it or to hide it is difficult to say. Twining vines carry bright flowers up the trunks and across from branch to branch, splashes of red and yellow and orange against the deep emerald green of the foliage.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: An enormous carved rock squats here in the jungle, overgrown with vines and creepers. The vegetation has encroached upon it from all sides, except to the east of it where a colossal pit plunges into the ground.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Huge trees draped with vines soar up to the sky, their massive trunks as wide as two caravans standing side by side. Younger trees and sprawling bushes hide the unevenness of the ground, filling in ruts and perching on hummocks, the leaves and branches blending into each other to form a dense mass.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Birds call back and forth from their nests high in the canopy and their perches on vines and branches. Tiny little dark birds flitter from place to place, always ready to dart away if a predator appears. Larger birds, gaudy in their plumage of blue and orange and yellow, and huge bills of black and yellow stripes, flap more leisurely from one perch to another, their caws and screeches ringing through the jungle.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Wilds
node.description: Centuries of fallen leaves, vines, branches and flowers have formed a spongy mat underfoot, a decaying record of the life of the trees and plants. A dense, earthy scent fills the air, the ghost of the ever-dying jungle lingering to haunt, for the jungle is ever-living as well, the cycle of growing and dying rolling on into the past and future.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: Towering trees, draped with eerie shrouds of moss and protruding from the surface of shallow turbid water, creates an environment of treacherous verdant beauty. A powerful stench from a rotting tangle of grass, plants and vines pervades the air. This watery mire continues to the north.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: Traveling deeper into the quagmire, the water-logged maze of old trees teem with life. Stinging swarms of mosquitos abound and powerful snapping turtles lie partially buried in the mud. Poisonous snakes glide along the water searching for prey while stately egrets fly over the vegetation.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: Rotting tree trunks alive with creepy, crawling, stinging insects jut out of the muck making travel even more difficult. Just ahead, an impassable pool of quicksand bars any further progress. Beyond it, a rock slab rises from the water.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rock Slab
node.description: A jagged rock slab rises high above the brackish water. From this vantage point, the entire swamp can be surveyed. Far to the west, the outline of a steep mountain can be seen through the forest of trees.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: A copse of majestic mangrove trees stands above the swamp on tangled roots. Rippling water, stained by the red of the tree bark, laps at its base. Staring down at you from a high perch on a long leafy branch is a vivid green iguana. Just to the north the high humpbacked outline of a hummock can be seen.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Hummock
node.description: Towering trees and vines create a jungle canopy above this small patch of dry land surrounded by murky water, while flowers and plants create a lush oasis in the midst of gloom. A graveyard hush and stillness pervade this tiny sanctuary. A primitive statue, remarkably free of mold and dirt, stands in a small clearing.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: The sickening odor of death and decay pervades the air from a rotting, ravaged body floating in the foul water. Its face is frozen in a grisly grimace of astonishment and agony. Buzzards circle slowly overhead waiting patiently for their prize.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: In sharp contrast to the horror found to the northwest, an open watery area filled with riotous colors from a floating garden in bloom are a delight for the senses. Ghost orchids, swamp lilies, and water hyacinths float on the surface and fill the air with their sweet perfume. A beautiful zebra butterfly drifts over the flowers on its long, thin wings of gold and velvet black.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: As the floating garden thins out, sunlight streaming through the leaves of the trees reflects on the black water. A large bullfrog sits on a floating lily pad, croaking its song. On a nearby mudflat, an alligator guards her nest from smaller predators. Scavenger picked bones stick out of the mire.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Swamp
node.description: Noxious water laps against stalks of sharp-bladed saw grass causing it to be brown, dry and brittle. In the distance, as the water freshens, it shades to a lush emerald green. The ground gently slopes upward as the dense growth begins to thin out. Further south, the fetid ordor of the swamp begins to improve.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: The swamp opens to a lush forest of poplar trees crowded with ravishing blooms of purple lupine. A gentle grassy slope ends in a high embankment overlooking a winding river cutting through the green woodland. To the north, a seemingly endless marshland stretches to the horizon.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: A clean refreshing breeze causes the leaves of the smooth, silvery aspen trees to tremble forebodingly. Eerie silence envelopes the surrounding area broken only by the occasional sound of gurgling water or a rustling shrub. In the distance, far to the west, a mist-shrouded, imposing mountain peak can be seen.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: The ground gently rises to a rounded hill ending in a steep cliff overlooking the water just ahead. Thick, sturdy grapevines entwine the trees from the forest floor to the canopy of these highland woods. A brilliantly colored humming bird forages among the vines, its tiny wings whirring as it hovers over a flower and dips its long, slender bill into the nectar.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: Overlooking the water, the steep cliff offers a panoramic view of the sinuously curving river and surrounding wooded hills. The edge is loose and unstable from constant exposure to wind and rain. Below the churning water is littered with large razor-sharp rocks.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: The knoll gradually descends, creating a small valley filled with vine-covered weeping willows. Luxuriant branches drape over the murmuring river, and to the south, sunlight dapples the water around the big sandbar that has formed in a cove at the foot of the knoll.

The knoll gradually descends, creating a small valley filled with vine-covered weeping willows. Luxuriant branches drape over the murmuring river, and to the south, moonlight dapples the water around the big sandbar that has formed in a cove at the foot of the knoll.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: Pointed stumps of aspens, with tooth marks in them, intermingle here and there with tall poplar trees. Wild raspberries grow in the brush near their trunks. A splash of color is visible on the facade of an immense boulder.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Sandbar
node.description: Sturdy trees covered with tough, supple vines ring this sheltered cove where the river has laid down a big sandbar. The stumps that stand here and there are unmistakeable signs that this is the best place to make and launch a raft. The surging waters of the river race by the cove, sweeping away anything or anyone unlucky enough to be caught in the current.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: An industrious beaver gnaws through trunk of an aspen tree with its sharp front teeth. Pointed stumps can be seen in every direction. Downed poplars litter the ground. The end of a log can just be seen being dragged down the clear sliding pathway to the southwest.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: The forest opens to a strand of shimmering quartz sand and fragmented shells ending in the gurgling water of the shallow, gravel-bottomed shoreline. The remnants of a wrecked raft lie slowly bleaching in the sand. The pathway continues to the southwest.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River's Edge
node.description: Dropped logs and saplings clutter the pristine white sand of this small beach. In a sheltered cove, just off shore, a tireless beaver makes repairs to its lodge.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Clearing
node.description: The thick jungle vegetation suddenly gives way to a small clearing. Someone has swept the ground clean of even the smallest pebble, and placed several fist-sized stones to form a path to a primitive hut made from branches, sticks, and fronds, and topped with a roof of broad, waxy leaves of the indigenous plants.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Hermit's Home
node.description: Only the bare essentials are present in the hut. A sleeping mat, a simple table, and a small cooking pot are the only major furnishings in the one-room dwelling. A light breeze passes through the gaps in the make-shift walls and an occasional gust curls the corner of a woven grass sleeping mat.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River Bank
node.description: A narrow strip along the edge of the river extends to the northwest, but away from the river bank, a tangled green wall of vines and creepers blocks any penetration into the jungle itself. Even the jungle dwellers must find the paths few and difficult.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, River Bank
node.description: The living green wall of jungle stands back a ways from the river here and to the southeast. It guards its territory like a single giant creature forbidding all entrance, yet even so, animals coming to drink have worn a path down the bankside to the river.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, The South Beach
node.description: This small beach, like the one to the north of the gate, offers little more than a view of the lagoon and its enclosing walls. But from this angle, it looks like some kind of trail runs along the top of the north crater wall.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: Several pilings have been sunk in the muck at the edge of the lagoon and the natives have constructed a walkway using them as support. Depending on whether the pilings found solid ground or quicksand, this walkway overhangs the water at varying heights as it continues along the rim of the lagoon.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: Bleached-white split logs, some cracked and peeling bark from their undersides, extend into the distance with only a rope rail between a dry passage and the wet lagoon. Every so often the walkway emits a loud creak, as if it were loosing its battle to remain above the muck.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: Sucked into the muck below, the pilings supporting this section of the Esplanade have sunk causing it to slant downward until it is only a few inches above the waves. Every so often a good wave smacks the pilings and sends enough spray shooting over the walkway to drench the feet of anyone unwary enough to be caught in this spot.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: As the walkway begins to slant upwards, the rim of the lagoon reveals several scraggly bushes clinging to the rocky side despite the heat. Perched out of reach at the top of the ledge is a grelkhur bush loaded with dark green seed pods.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: The scent of the Lagoon grows strong here, as its water bakes in the tropical heat causing it to release the perfume particular to a jungle watering hole. A few monkeys screech in the surrounding trees as they cavort around swinging through the few branches that overhang the lagoon. A loud splash caused by a coconut hitting the water imposes a sudden but brief silence.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: A huge pile of rocks jut quite a distance into the lagoon but the pilings supporting this walkway have been set on either side of the fall allowing passage above it. From up here, it is almost possible to grab a branch extending over the lagoon from a tree on shore.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Esplanade
node.description: Slowly the esplanade begins to slant upwards, as if retreating from the waters beneath. A sharp angle ahead hides the direction the walkway takes. The sheer wall that forms this part of the rim looms over small beach where a few birds splash in shallow bowls in the sand.

node.name: The Lagoon, Rim of the Crater
node.description: The rocky rim of the crater wall rises a few feet above the crashing waves. A crude step leading down into the lagoon makes it clear that someone comes to the water's edge here, down a trail that ascends the rim of the lagoon and wends up into the jungle.

node.name: The Lagoon, Rim of the Crater
node.description: The rocky trail descends from the jungle's vines and undergrowth onto the rim of a volcanic crater, now cooled. The ocean has filled the crater, broken at the western end, and formed a large circular lagoon.

node.name: The Lagoon, Rim of the Crater
node.description: The dense jungle growth appears to thin here at the beginning of a trail leading west. The sound of surf can be heard from that direction, and an occasional breeze brings the smell of the ocean.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Trail
node.description: A rocky trail leads toward a small range of mountains in the west. The gleaming water of the lagoon ripples softly in the distance as the fickle ocean breeze dances over its surface.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Trail
node.description: Small rocks line a pathway that curves slightly to the northwest, leading to a jagged mountain cliff. In the distance towards the eastern horizon, a faint shimmer of reflected light reveals the presence of the ocean's enduring waves.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Trail
node.description: A large wall of rock rises to the west, looming imposingly over the faint uneven trail. Valiantly struggling to thrive in the poor soil, a small tree stands beside the path. The sapling's roots twine about a large boulder, trying to draw what nourishment it can from the poor soil.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Trail
node.description: To the west, the base of the jagged cliff is covered by an intricate web of cracks and small ledges, adequate holds for a skilled climber.

node.name: Jalren'ra'Taisidon, Cliff Base
node.description: The dark earth of the path ends abruptly at the bottom of a sheer stone cliff. Clouds of dust rise from the face as fickle breezes dislodge loose bits of rock.

node.name: Jalren'rai'Taisidon, Pass
node.description: The trail wends its way through this gap between two snow-covered mountain peaks. Faint patches of grassland can be seen to the southeast. Littered with huge boulders, the trail begins to slope downward.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Passage
node.description: A narrow trail littered with scree threads its way between several large boulders. The loose gravel makes the footing very unstable, and the jagged-edged rocks surrounding the path would make a fall less than comfortable.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Passage
node.description: A leathery rustling sound can be heard below. The trail becomes steeper and the footing more tenuous.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Passage
node.description: Gaps and holes in the rocks create lonely moaning sounds as the wind rushes through. Unfamiliar sounds can be heard in the distance.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Overlook
node.description: A wide opening in the rocks offers a spectacular view of a lush valley. Thick ebongrass tall enough to hide a halfling grows as far as the eye can see. Tall, knobby khor'vela trees dot the landscape, some growing to astonishing heights. The savannah is teeming with life. Several groups of heitaks graze peacefully, seemingly unaware of nearby menacing shapes weaving intricate patterns in the grass.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Rock Ledge
node.description: The steep trail ends on a wide ledge allowing a panoramic view of the entire valley. From this vantage point, the size of the savannah is clear. Sheer cliffs stretching into the sky border the grassy plain on all sides. On the horizon, barely visible, a thin trail snakes up to a large, sunny plateau.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Jungle Overgrowth
node.description: The jungle, once teeming with activity and overflowing with a cacophony of sound, is still and silent. The moist, dank air wraps itself around everything like a smothering blanket, and muffles the sounds of creaking leather and clanking metal. Only one direction of travel offers a convenient path and the strikingly similar foliage only serves to confuse and hinder judgement.

node.name: Cliff Face
node.description: Blotting out the light, the broken face of the cliff rises imposingly into the sky. A fine web of cracks and ledges creates a pathway for an experienced climber to use.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cliff Top
node.description: From this vantage point, the shimmering depths of the ocean lie spread out to the east. Snow-capped mountain peaks jut high into the sky as the mountain range blocks all passage westward. A faint path leads northward, running perilously close to the jagged edge of a steep cliff.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mountain Path
node.description: The rocky trail twists and turns like a snake molting its skin, rising northward to a gap between two mountain peaks. Tall trees rise beside the path, blanketing the mountain stone with a thick cushion of brown needles. A haunting stillness fills the air, out of place in woods which normally should be teeming with wildlife.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: Steady winds buffet the tall black grass, sending ripples along the fields like waves in an ocean of pitch. Several young khor'vela trees protrude from the inky grass, waving to and fro in the wind.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Trickling Stream
node.description: Rivulets of sparkling water cascade down the steep, cracked rock wall enclosing the valley. The waters collect at the base of the cliff to form a small stream flowing to the east.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: Progress through the thick grass is difficult. The wind whistles through a small, dark opening in the canyon wall to the northeast. The plateau looms above the fog in the distance. Gnarled trees and bushes can be discerned, barely visible in the fog.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: The largest khor'vela in this clump is half again as thick and nearly twice as tall as the rest of the trees. It waves ponderously in the wind, too tall and too thin to put up much of a fight.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Watering Hole
node.description: A small clearing in the dark grass opens to reveal a clear pool. Protected from the winds by the surrounding grass, the water is serene and glassy. Countless sets of tracks in the soggy soil surrounding the water indicate this is a popular watering hole. A sun-bleached ribcage laying nearby indicates this is a popular dining spot as well.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: The khor'vela trees tower high in the sky, swaying in the constant breeze. Scraps of bark, shed like a snake's skin, lie strewn about the base of the trees which grow clumped together in clusters of three or four.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: In the center of the wind-swept field of thick ebongrass, the leathery swishing of the blades combines with the whistling wind to mask all but the loudest of sounds.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: A recent rockslide has deposited a large amount of rock and debris in a huge pile. Unfortunately, from the look of the half-chewed leg poking out of the pile, a heitak was caught unaware by the avalanche and was crushed.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave Opening
node.description: A dark cave mars the otherwise unblemished surface of the cliffs. Packs of flies settle and feed on the deep, blood-stained gouges in the dirt where carcasses have been dragged into the depths of the lair. The foul stench of death permeates the area.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Scattered with bones and ravaged carcasses, this is obviously the home of a predator. The cave reeks of decaying meat, fresh blood, and a powerful mixture of dung and urine. A low buzzing from the wings of hundreds of flies permeates the lair, pulsing as if the sound itself were alive.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Continuing along uneven, rocky footing, the cave narrows somewhat from the area immediately inside the entrance. Although still not at all pleasant, the air here has more of a stale scent, with only a hint of the filth preceding it. The walls are lined with an intricate network of cobwebs so dense that they almost seem to glow a dim grey.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Making the path seem an even tighter squeeze than it actually is, pointy stone projections jut from both sides. A tiny pool of water fills a rut in the ground, presenting a fine opportunity for the unwary to turn an ankle. An occasional drop from somewhere above splashes into it, but the source is not visible.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: The floor dips into a shallow bowl shape. It isn't too steep to negotiate easily, but the center is uneven due to a pile of pebbles, sticks, and bones collected there. A faint rustling can be heard, but the acoustics of the confined area make it difficult to pinpoint the direction it comes from.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: The ground is deeply scored in two parallel tracks with splotches of a brown substance between them. Seemingly, something heavy was dragged through here. A shiny object glints from within a pile of rubble.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: The cave dead-ends here, going no farther to the north. Off to one side is a badly mangled breastplate amidst the remains of a warrior who clearly lost this battle. A few flies buzz around, although there isn't much of the body left other than the bones.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Based on several gouges in the walls and faint traces of ore visible within them, it looks like this place was mined sometime in past. No substantial veins can be seen now, so perhaps there is nothing left worth extracting. There are a few lengths of rotting timber near the opening leading off to the northeast, probably the remains of braces used to prevent cave-ins.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Treading through here disturbs a thick layer of dust, making breathing difficult. Deep furrows lined with tiny stone chips mar the rock to the sides. A broken pick-axe leans abandoned against one wall.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: An old wheelbarrow lies overturned beside a hole in the ground. It's not clear whether the digger found what he was looking for or just gave up, but there isn't anything in there now except dirt. Now and then, a bit of something can be heard falling to the ground, perhaps implying that this place isn't quite stable.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: From this point northward, it no longer resembles a mining area. The passage appears to have been burrowed rather than carefully excavated. Although it is fairly level, the ground feels slightly unsteady and seems to be vibrating slightly.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Cave
node.description: Hard-packed mounds of dirt close off any possible progress farther north. Aside from that, everything here looks completely natural. A faint rustling can be heard, but what is doing it and precisely where it's coming from are not obvious.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Narrow Canyon
node.description: The canyon is relatively wide here, boasting a pleasant lawn of close-cropped grass on each side of a stream narrow enough to jump across. A few sturdy trees along the slick rock walls yearn upward toward the sky, their widespread limbs sheltering dense bramble thickets.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Narrow Canyon
node.description: Shady and cool, a stream meanders its way along the bottom of this sheltered place. The footing here is somewhat treacherous, the haphazardly mounded rocks, rubble and scree further slickened by algae and damp. A few hardy plants cling to the margins of the stream, while mosses and lichens paint the rock walls with extravagant greens and greys of every hue.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: The remains of a medium-sized par'i heitak lie in the center of a matted circle of gore-stained grass. Large blue-backed flies swarm overhead, as if their meal has been disturbed by the sudden presence of intruders. To the east, a wide break in the continuous sea of grass is visible.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Chasm Edge
node.description: The fissure narrows slightly here to a half-dozen paces across. Traces of a wispy fog can be seen drifting within the dark depths of the chasm. Across the gap a khor'vela tree grows, twisted and deformed.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Chasm Edge
node.description: A gaping chasm yawns mockingly at your feet. The steeply sloping sides are studded profusely with jagged-edged outcroppings, several stained darkly with what appears to be dried blood. Tendrils of mist caress the bloody rocks.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: The distant plateau looms high above you, jutting out of a thick layer of fog. The sides of the rocky mesa are steep and cluttered with craggy outcroppings. The top of the plateau appears to be grass covered.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Chasm Edge
node.description: Two sets of four evenly-spaced furrows are visible in the soil. Beginning near the edge, the claw marks end rather abruptly at the lip of the chasm. Bloody streaks on the rocks below contrast glaringly with a bleached white heitak skull lying on a flat outcrop nearby.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: A cluster of several tiny khor'vela saplings surround a group of dead khor'vela trees. A scorched and blackened stump at the center of the clump marks the site of a powerful lightning strike. Bits and pieces of what was once a majestic khor'vela litter the ground.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Pit Edge
node.description: The fissure opens into a massive pit filled to the rim with a viscous grey-green fog. A steady howl echoes from the unseen depths, despite the air's deathly stillness. Wispy tendrils of fog emerge from the chasm, dragging along the edge of the gaping sinkhole like unseeing hands reaching out to explore their surroundings before sinking back into the frothing mist.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Savannah
node.description: The high walls of the canyon block the strong winds and offer temporary relief from the constant gusts. High, craggy cliffs leap skyward, pushing out of the flat ground in a knife-sharp line.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mist
node.description: The trees and grasses of the savannah give way to a blank, lifeless wasteland of fog. The only remaining khor'vela tree on this side of the chasm has been mutated and warped into a gnarled shadow of its former glory. A foreboding hill rises from the mist-covered ground, a path to its summit visible in the distance.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mist
node.description: The mist from the pit seeps slowly over the recessed lip of the canyon, covering the ground in a sickly pallor. Almost spongy in consistency, the fog preserves your footsteps momentarily before they are slowly devoured by the crawling mist as it obliterates any trace of passage.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mist
node.description: The mist completely obscures the ground and has totally eliminated the plant life on this side of the chasm. Emanating from the giant pit to the west, the fog seems to be creeping slowly towards the towering plateau, ominously overlooking the valley floor.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Mist
node.description: Glowing blue stones flank a winding path as it twists and turns up the hillside. The mist collects in a swirling puddle at the base of the trail and sinuous tendrils snake slowly upwards, drawn by some unknown force.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Path
node.description: Treacherous and winding, the path is dangerously obscured by the dense vapor oozing its way toward the summit. The stones lining the trail shine with an eerie light, adding a sickly blue tint to the pale grey-green color of the fog.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Path
node.description: From this vantage point, the savannah is once again visible. The vibrant and living grasslands contrast sharply with the desolate, fog-shrouded plain on the east side of the fissure. The true scope and size of the gaping pit that covers the southern portion of the valley can finally be seen from this altitude. The center of the hole is filled with churning and swirling mist illuminated from deep within by a faint glow.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Path
node.description: Traversing the plateau once again, the path narrows sharply as it passes through a large gap in the stone of the mountain itself. The gummy vapor clings to the slick interior walls of the passage, leaving wispy traces that slowly evaporate into nothingness.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Summit
node.description: Turning sharply, the path climbs to the top of the plateau and rises suddenly out of a sea of fog. Thick mists give way grudgingly to scraggly greyish grass, which, in turn, gives way to healthy green grass. Bright sunlight is visible to the east.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Grassy Plateau
node.description: A grassy plateau expands eastward from the summit of the gently sloping path. Waves of green and golden grass bend softly in the wind and lend a slightly sweet aroma to the air. In the distance, the pale meadow yields again to dark forms that rise against the sky.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Grassy Plateau
node.description: A buzzard perched atop a silver-flecked rock that juts from the rippling grass pecks at the fleshy remains of a small meal. It looks up occasionally to plaintively survey the broad plateau for intruders in its domain. Flies and tiny insects hover just above the grass humming almost inaudibly.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Grassy Plateau
node.description: Dry witchgrass crackles with every movement, and insects hum in the pollen-thick air. A low stone hut stands to the northeast, its weather-bleached thatch a pale cap to the mushroom-like structure. The hut's plank door stands slightly ajar.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Grassy Plateau
node.description: A tall arch ornately carved with totems of the Immortals stands before a neatly pruned cemetery to the east. A low granite wall embraces the clearing, diminishing behind a weed-choked hill that rises in the center of the enclosure. Flowering hedges line the cobbled walkway leading to the entrance.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Stone Hut
node.description: The small hut is cool and dry, the air scented with sweet and musty smells. Mice and insects chitter in the thatching above the sparsely furnished room. The desiccated corpse of an elderly Elothean man slumps over a book atop a desk beside the plank door, an ivory scribing quill still in his shriveled hand. On the wall hang several crumbling parchments.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Kerwaith'lyba Burial Grounds
node.description: Monuments and crypts of polished marble line a neatly raked gravel trail that spirals inward toward the center of the clearing, where it vanishes into the tangled overgrowth that blankets the hill. Raevelthorn wreaths and potted oleander surround a gilded mausoleum near the trail.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Kerwaith'lyba Burial Grounds
node.description: Lead urns neatly spaced between three headstones spill over with fragrant blossoms that frame the epitaphs carved in the smooth stone. The green lawn dotted with stones slopes toward the hill where the grass yields to a dark tangle of vines.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Kerwaith'lyba Burial Grounds
node.description: The edge of the gravel path feathers at the grassline, where violets grow beyond their once carefully kept beds. To the north, the trail fades further into taller grass. Larger headstones lining the trail dwarf a small bronze marker sheltered by a blooming sjarta bush and spotted with creeping lichen.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Kerwaith'lyba Burial Grounds
node.description: Weather-smoothed headstones poke through the tall grass, some leaning toward each other like bent old men having quiet conversations. Thorny vines grow around the stones and press against the thinning trail. A loamy scent rises from the dark patches of soil dappled with green moss. An iron gate lies rusted open on its side in the thick overgrowth, leaving little clue as to whether it was to keep visitors out or something else inside.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Kerwaith'lyba Burial Grounds
node.description: The ground slopes sharply beneath the tangled mesh of vines and weeds arching across the trail. Rocks jut from the broken trail that ascends to the peak, where the shrubs and vines border a circular clearing. A ring of tall grey stones at the top of the hill rises sharply against the wide sky.

node.name: Campsite
node.description: Rocks and foliage have been cleared to make room for the large tent that someone has set up in this area. The heavy canvas tarps, held in place by branches, are silvery from long exposure to the elements. Near the tent, a firepit holds scattered bits of charred wood and scorched rocks as evidence that others have passed here before.

node.name: Campsite, Tent
node.description: The main area of the shelter is spare but comfortable. Gear is stacked neatly around its perimeter -- personal items and food requiring protection from the constant threat of mildew and marauding insects take up much of the space here. The odors of canvas and tired adventurers blend with the overriding deep green scent of the tropics.

node.name: Tent, Sleeping Quarters
node.description: Layers of palm fronds line the hard packed earthen floors, while bed-rolls are placed haphazardly about the room. The cloying scent of citrus candles and moldering canvas hangs heavy in the oppressive heat of this small and dimly lit space.

node.name: Tent, Sleeping Quarters
node.description: Undefinable shapes move in slithery patterns over the dank canvas walls, while the distinctive *thwap* of large insects hitting the ceiling of the tent keep up a steady staccato rhythm. Tidy cots, each hung with its own mosquito netting, line either side of the room. Flickering candlelight from the many insect-repelling candles set about the room give off meager light and fill the air with their pungent aroma.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gash
node.description: A deep chasm breaks the rocky surface of the path in two. The remains of a rope bridge hang forlornly against the far side of the gash, the connecting planks reaching nearly to the bottom of the chasm. Several trees grow at haphazard angles over the chasm, some reaching almost to the other side.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gash
node.description: A deep chasm breaks the rocky surface of the path in two. The remains of a rope bridge hang forlornly against the far side of the gash, the connecting planks reaching nearly to the bottom of the chasm. Several trees grow at haphazard angles over the chasm, some reaching almost to the other side.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The length of the tree trunk stretches across the gash to the north. The southern edge of the chasm is within easy reach.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The midway point of the tree trunk lies to the north.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The trunk of the tree sways slightly at the midway point, unsettled by the slightest gust of wind.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The midway point of the tree trunk lies to the south.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The length of the tree trunk stretches across the gash to the south. The northern edge of the chasm is within easy reach.

node.name: Gash
node.description: The sheer walls of the gash rise to either side, several hundred feet high. Scores of dead bodies litter the ground, their armor and weapons rusted with age. The remains of the rope bridge stretch up the side of stone walls.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: A small beach nearby offers a place to rest and regroup at the foot of the South Tower, which rises from the narrow strip to the crater rim far, far overhead. The wall of the lagoon curves smoothly southward and westward, declining as it approaches the open western side, like the rim of a bowl tilted toward the west.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Although you are directly west of the water gate, the strong outflow from the river makes swimming up to the gate itself impossible. The same currents that aided your passage into the lagoon bar that exit.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: A small strip of land lies at the base of the North Tower, which looms over the little beach like the upraised arm of a giant. The wall of the lagoon curves smoothly northward and westward at the level of the giant's forearm, sloping down toward the open western side.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The high crater wall stretches east and west, shielding the lagoon against northerly storms. The faintest ribbon of green lies upon the rim high above.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Here at the lowest part of the crater wall, foam washes a slim crevice just above the waterline. Scarring on the sides of the crevice shows that something was once wedged within, perhaps as a handhold or a step to help mount to the crater's rim.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The water at the western end of the lagoon roils like the wrath of Drogor. The waves crash through the gap, thrown through the narrow breach in the crater wall. Foam spins high into the air as the surf roars against the rock to either side. Maybe a shark or dolphin could make headway against that tide, but nothing with legs could do it.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The crater wall rises high and straight from the water, curving to the north. It may not be smooth as glass, but it is sheer enough to defeat any attempt, no matter how skillful, aided only by bare hands.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The forbiddingly high crater wall stretches east and west, a bastion that protects the lagoon against southerly storms. Hardly a seam or crack mars the black surface, which looks almost polished, reflecting light deep into the water.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Here in the center of the lagoon, shoved back and forth by wayward currents, one could appreciate the exactness of nature's architecture, if the waves left any time for contemplation. These waves that exhaust and defeat the swimmer would scarcely bother a ship sheltered from the ocean storm in this generous harbor.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Currents sweep and swirl from every direction here at the heart of the lagoon. A bird in a storm must feel the same helplessness before vast and impersonal powers that take no more notice of a man than of a minnow.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Oysters have colonized a crease or wrinkle in the bottom of the crater, patiently opening and closing in a unison of mindless feeding. No doubt they hold their own mysteries within their unknown purpose, like a lustrous pearl inside a dark shell.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The base of the towers and the lower grill waver dimly through the water to the east. A few plants on the floor of the lagoon find an insecure hold in pockets of silt caught within the rubble.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Far below in the blue-green waters of the lagoon, some curious objects are just visible: a series of perfectly round boulders. These frozen bubbles are a mute witness to the long-forgotten birth of the island in fire and smoke when it rose from the sea in layer upon layer of ash and lava.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Sea water surges through the gap in the crater rim, making any further westward movement impossible. A swimmer beyond that gap would risk being battered to death against the crater walls by wave after crashing wave. The salt water is cleaner, though, and the rubble on the bottom is clearly visible.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Outside the grill, the strong flow of the river has scoured the bottom clean, and rocks fallen from the crater walls cover the basin floor. Silt in the water makes it hard to see in any direction, and the current flows powerfully westward.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The force of the current is checked dramatically as tide and stream strive for mastery. The ocean pushes its way toward shore one moment only to be pushed back by the river in the next. The muddy flow from the river still clouds the water, obscuring vision in every direction.

node.name: Once Fine Cutlery, Front Room
node.description: Surrounded by walls covered with gouges and nicks, the dusty sales floor stretches across the room and is littered with broken cutlery and shattered flatware. A few cabinets that likely once displayed the wares stand bare and empty, their doors either broken or left ajar.

node.name: Once Fine Cutlery, Storage
node.description: A minefield of glass and ceramic litters the floor as far as the eye can see. A thin layer of dust rests atop the majority of the broken furniture, as though nothing has been disturbed for some time. The faint smell of sulfur fills the room, drawing the eye towards several large scorch marks along the walls.

node.name: The Painted Barn, Tools and Trade
node.description: Pervaded with atrophy, the burned walls barely form any real barrier to keep out the elements. As a result, mold has begun to grow along edges of the room, and a noxious odor wafts through the air. Bits of metal and wood litter the floor, waiting to be claimed by the growing mold.

node.name: The Painted Barn, Tack and Gear
node.description: Mold spreads along the charred walls, giving the blackened wood a rotten, white and green hue in several spots. Clearly once meant for the displaying of tools, empty and rusted hooks line the walls and overlook the littered floor.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Entrance Cave
node.description: Jumbled rocks and boulders block most of the light entering the narrow mouth of this cave. A worn path threads between the obstructions further into the gloom.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: The passage widens slightly as it delves deeper into the mountain. Jagged limestone stalactites loom above, like gnawed finger bones waiting for someone to snatch.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Twisting between some enormous boulders, the faint path winds its way deeper under ground. Gaping voids in the ceiling show where the slabs originated from.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Long and narrow, this passage continues into the darkness leaving only glowing moss as the light source. The sound of dripping water echoes against the granite walls and pebbles groan under foot. Rank odors waft in the air and assail the senses.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: The passage opens into a round, spacious room. Sharp, glinting rock walls make an impenetrable cage were it not for the continuing passage.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Twisting like a snake, the corridor of rock leads further into the heart of the mountain. The path is hardly wide enough for a gnome to tread and pointed rocks lie silently in wait of a flailing arm or leg. Pebbles from the ceiling bounce against the rocks and land loudly on the ground.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Gates
node.description: Thick slabs of roughly hewn wood securely fastened by stout diagonal battens of a darker wood make up the double massive entry gates. Centered in the line of logs spearing imposingly into the sky, the gates resemble a dark squared gem set in the thick band of the defensive palisade circle.

The orange light of the guttering torches casts a sooty, wavering light up the smooth barricade of the immense double doors of the entrance gates set centrally in the thick band of the log palisade spearing imposingly into the sky.

The orange light of the guttering torches casts a sooty, wavering light up the smooth barricade of the immense double doors of the entrance gates, which are set centrally in the thick band of the log palisade spearing imposingly into the sky.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Path
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the sky, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade End
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the sky, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Storage Hut
node.description: Constructed near the looming logs of the palisade, a three-sided hut crammed with hides, food storage, and tribal crafts is shaded from the heat of the day by the softly waving fronds of a gum tree. The area before the hut has been paved with broad flat stones, forming a patio holding the heat of the sun in the rock.
Close by the looming logs of the palisade a three-sided hut crammed with hides, food storage, and tribal crafts is half hidden in the dusky shades of night.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: Centered at an angle across this corner of the commons, a long grass hut lounges amid the almost painful neatness of the area. Crossing diagonal traces in the swept dirt suggest this area may be used in the training of warriors, as do the grass-stuffed forms of training dummies leaning against the hut. The sharp spice from the swamp bay at the center of the commons does little to allay the mingled ancient smells of sweat and blood that have permeated the ground.

The scent of a thick savory stew spills from the large pot briskly simmering on the large cooking fire blazing near a long grass hut angled across the clearing, combining with the sharp tang of spice emanating from the large swamp bay centered in the commons. The light from the blazing fire throws the painful neatness of the clearing before the hut into sharp relief, giving enough light to pick out swirls in the neatly swept dirt and easily see the stern neatness surrounding this corner.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: An ill-tended grass hut slouches in the far corner of a scruffy clearing, scatters of wood chips and carving curls littering the area before the entrance. The shaggy reddish bark of the swamp bay in the center of the clearing scents the air with a sharp spice aroma as welcome shade flutters under the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

A rejected carving of a small owl smolders dejectedly in the tiny night fire. Surrounded by the sharp tang of spice drifting from the huge swamp willow in the center of the commons, an ill-tended grass hut slouches in the darkest corner. The only evidence of habitation is the scatter of wood chips and carving curls liberally littering the area before the entrance of the hut.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: A spartan grass hut boldly claims this corner of the commons. The ground is fastidiously cleared of every weed, the remaining vegetation militarily neat under the spreading boughs of the swamp bay. The clean spice scent of the tree anoints the air as the welcome shade flutters from the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

A spartan grass hut boldly claims this corner of the commons. The ground is fastidiously cleared, the remaining vegetation militarily neat. A clean spice scent anoints the air as an evening breeze flutters restlessly through the broad leaves of the gnarled swamp bay. The embers of a small cooking fire glow in the darkness, painting this corner of the clearing in a weak illumination.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: The plump rotund grass hut squats in cheerful squalor surrounded by a neglected rock garden, the scent of the minute purple and white violets peeking up from the vine-twined rocks competing with the sharp spiciness of the swamp bay holding court from the center of the clearing. Welcome shade flutters from the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Abandoned Hut
node.description: The relentless humidity and heat have taken their toll on the dilapidated hut sagging dispiritedly in the overgrown clearing at the end of the path. Shunned by its neighbors, the structure is prevented from total collapse only by the sturdy trunks of the palisade against which it now leans.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, West Ward
node.description: The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground a cluster of grass huts can be seen to the north.

The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground small flickering night fires are visible from the north.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Interior Gates
node.description: Just within the gates a broad expanse of hard-beaten earth runs in either direction along the stockade wall. The faint chatter of village life drifts sporadically from the north.
Two massive torches flare brilliantly on either side of the gate, washing the barren area in a flickering orange hue. In the dim light, night fires are visible clustering to the north on either side.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Central Ward
node.description: Hard-packed ground barren of any vegetation forms a protective necklace separating the sprawl of vulnerable huts and gardens from the defensive stockade. Below, the massive gates mark the main entrance into this haven from the wilderness.

A defensive band of hard-packed earth curls around the southern end of the vulnerable village, leaving sufficient room for guards to patrol the stockade or warriors to mass if danger threatens. On the far side of the beaten ground, the flicker of small night fires strives to ward away the evils that stalk the night.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, East Ward
node.description: The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground, a cluster of grass huts can be seen to the north.

The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground, night fires flicker from the north.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: Sharp shards of broken crockery lie in an untidy pile behind the stout conical hut surrounded by heaped piles of colored dirt. Dappled shade washes over all from the broad branches the bay tree spreads in a protective parasol from the hub of the clearing, bringing the illusion of relief from the oppressive heat.

The embers of a small cooking fire glow in the darkness, throwing a weak illumination over the stout conical hut. The heaps of clay and dirt surrounding the hut take on fantastical shapes that seem to slink just out of clear vision in the uneven light.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: A pile of neatly trimmed branches is stacked by the curved wall of a well-tended conical hut. The sweet scent of bay wafting from the thick gnarled tree commanding the center of the commons competes with the astringent odor of rendering dye slowly simmering over the cooking fire.

A small cooking fire casts a wavering illumination over the well tended ground and prosperous hut in this corner of the clearing. Stacked neatly at the rear of the hut, a pile of neatly trimmed branches waits in readiness to feed the flickering flames.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: Halved logs have been set as a base to hold a complicated arrangement of woven reeds and branches being used as a drying rack. Rows of halved coconut shells, each neatly hollowed out, are inverted on the rack to cure. Following a rough arc, a wide fire blazes busily under a pot of furiously boiling water by a narrow conical hut.

The cooking fire burns brightly in this corner of the commons, brilliantly illuminating the narrow shaft of the conical hut and the wide drying rack flanking it on either side. The smell of simmering herbs strongly permeates the shadows from the velvet darkness within the hut.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Drums
node.description: Spread under the shady branches, several large bamboo segments are in varying stages of being hollowed out. A few wood-handled implements that appear to be used for scooping the pulp from the bamboo lie on the ground in front of an oval hut. As quiet as the area is now, the entire jungle will know when these drums are finished.

Sweetbay branches dispel a bit of the omniscient heat of the jungle as they sway in the night breeze. Their lazy movement creates silent shadows that chase each other around large, partially hollowed, bamboo segments in front of the oval hut. As darkness caused the day's labor to cease, the tools used to fashion the drums were dropped and scattered on the ground where they wait to trip the unwary.

Spread under the shady branches, several large bamboo segments are in varying stages of being hollowed out. A few wood-handled implements that appear to be used for scooping the pulp from the bamboo lie on the ground in front of an oval hut. As quiet as the area is now, the entire jungle will know when these drums are finished.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of vibrant dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Feasting Hub
node.description: Hexagonal pieces of slate have been selected and tiled over the ground at the hub to form a radiating mantra of color that draws the eye inexorably from the pale beige slate of the rim to the deep ebony of the center.
Massive torches placed at each cardinal point send a sooty light flickering over the slate mosaic tiling over the ground of the hub, drawing all attention to the deep ebony of the center.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub.
